name: FOR THE LONELY
content: I wished on the wrong star

Cuz i always seem so far
那个我梦想的人太过遥远
依依不舍地离开我的爱
But i'll make it on my own
Cuz i'm learning to be strong

But no one's by my side
For now i'll say this prayer
